directions: In a medium bowl, combine crushed pretzels, melted butter, and sugar.  Press mixture into a pie pan.
In a large bowl, mix together lime juice, lime zest, orange juice, and sweetened condensed milk. Fold in whipped topping. Spoon filling into pretzel crust. Chill pie for 25 to 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Margarita Pie
